Sonic_Siphon.display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken their Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.
Sonic_Siphon.display_victim_hit: Your resistance to damage has been reduced by the {PowerName} of {PlayerSource}.

Sonic_Barrier.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Barriers on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Barrier.display_target_help: The Sonic Shield has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.
Sonic_Barrier.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from physical attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Barrier.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Haven.display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Havens on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Barrier. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Haven.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)
Sonic_Haven.display_target_help: The Sonic Shield has increased your resistances to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage.
Sonic_Haven.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from physical attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Haven.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Cage.display_help: Encases the target in an impenetrable field of sonic waves. The target cannot attack or be attacked. Recharge: Moderate
Sonic_Cage.display_target_help: You have been encased in a Sonic Cage. You cannot be harmed, but you can only use powers which affect you.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You encase {PlayerDest} in an impenetrable {PowerName}. They cannot move and can only affect themselves now.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} encases you in an impenetrable {PowerName}. You cannot move and can only affect yourself!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You encase {PlayerDest} in an impenetrable {PowerName}. They cannot move and can only affect themselves now.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} encases you in an impenetrable {PowerName}. You cannot move and can only affect yourself!

Disruption_Field.display_help: You set up a constant wave of sonic energy around an ally, weakening the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Moderate
Disruption_Field.display_target_help: The Ally Buff Field creates an area around a target ally which reduces the Resistance of all foes near them.
Disruption_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

Sonic_Dispersion.display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All DMG except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_help: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_short_help: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Sonic__Repulsion.display_help: You create a powerful sonic resonance around an ally, repelling all foes nearby. You will lose endurance for each target repelled. Recharge: Moderate
Sonic__Repulsion.display_short_help: Toggle: Ranged (Target Ally AoE), Foe Knockback
Sonic__Repulsion.display_target_help: A sonic field has been placed around you, which repels all foes who attempt to get near you.
Sonic__Repulsion.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}, and will knock down any villain that approach them.
Sonic__Repulsion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you with a {PowerName}, knocking back any foes that get too close.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knocked {PlayerDest} from their feet with your {PowerName} attack!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you from your feet with their {PowerName} attack!

Clarity.display_help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free them from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, or Immobilize effects, and leave them resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
Clarity.display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Terrorize, Confusion), +Perception
Clarity.display_target_help: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.
Clarity.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power, and improve their Perception.
Clarity.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects and improve your Perception.

Liquefy.display_help: You unleash a barrage of sonic waves on the Earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake. The impact of the sonic shockwave may Hold some foes and deal some minor damage. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and Defense. Recharge: Slow
Liquefy.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DMG(Smashing/Energy), Foe Hold, Knockdown, -To Hit, -DEF
Liquefy.display_target_help: The ground beneath you has been liquefied! You are stuck in sludge and taking minor damage. Your chance to hit, Defense and movement rates are reduced.
